headline: Boeing Faces New Jet Issues While International Orders Test Recovery Story
summary: New technical issues have emerged on Boeing's (NYSE:BA) widebody jets, including GE9X engine problems on the 777X and a fuel control switch defect on the 787 Dreamliner, leading to groundings and additional regulatory attention. Boeing has halted F-15 fighter jet production for Indonesia after a proposed deal did not move forward. At the Singapore Airshow, Boeing reported fresh commercial interest, including Air Cambodia's agreement for up to 20 737 MAX jets and discussions of major...
